scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Mary Carrasco
scrape.text: I've read some great reviews on The Dinner so I was hoping for an enjoyable read. Unfortunately, this was just not a book for me. What didn't I like? The author does a fine job of beating around the bush and by the time I was figuring out some things, I felt like I had been run around in circles of useless information to get there.
